name: bj-alequex
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, wff w0
body: |- wi(wal(s0, wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), w0)), wex(s0, w0))

stmt.origin: mpi(wal(s0, wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), w0)), wex(s0, w0), wex(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1))))

|- wi(wal(s0, wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), w0)), wex(s0, w0))

-| wi(wal(s0, wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), w0)), wi(wex(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wex(s0, w0)))

comment: A fol lemma. See ~ bj-alequexv for a version with a disjoint variable condition requiring fewer axioms. Can be used to reduce the proof of ~ spimt from 133 to 112 bytes. (Contributed by BJ, 6-Oct-2018.)
